Trinity::

Trinity's wounds started to heal and her energy started to increase. 
The little bot started to move.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Next to Trinity a portal began to open as a blue, red, and white 
figure fell 
> from it and onto his face, burn marks all over his back. He looks 
over to 
> Trinity before his wings cover her and he lays a hand on her 
stomach. His 
> hand begins to glow a bright green as does Trinitys body, her 
wounds begining 
> to heal...
